properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 5 at 2:43AM PST until February 6 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Valley snow accumulations of 2 to 4
inches. 3 to 6 inches possible above 6000 feet. Winds gusting
as high as 45 mph.

* WHERE...Northern Elko County.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Thursday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be very difficult along U.S.
93 from Wells to Jackpot. Gusty winds could cause some blowing
and drifting of snow across roadways.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads
and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THURSDAY
